timeline.bodyText:
I think a user will want to specify different backoff for different situation, rather than using a single Backoff.
How about using a fluent API like this: (Just a draft)
RetryStrategy.builder()
             .on().idempotentMethod()
                    .then(someBackoff)
             .on()....then(otherBackoff)
             .on()....thenStop()
             .on()....thenImmediately()
             .build();
If no conditions match, could skip retrying.

Had chat internally on the default() method, we could not decide which rule is good for default. And there are other issues as well.
